channel.title: Clicking the spot?

item.title: Clicking the spot?
item.dc:creator: @dawwn dawwn
item.description:
@dawwn wrote:

eh, I need help on making the button of the log in clickable to where I want. I currently moved the “Click here to login” to the middle by changing these settings in the client around

int l = c / 2; int k1 = c1 / 2 + 12; aBackground_967.method361(l - 73, k1 - 20); boldText.drawCenteredText(0xffffff, l, "Click here to login.", k1 + 5, true);

So the box now went from all the way to the bottom to the middle, but the box to log in isn’t clickable, but I can still click all the way at the bottom to where the button was before and it works to log in.
How can I make it so when instead of clicking down to where the button was, I put the thing to log in where the button is now.

Read full topic
